im using dragon-history.
i tried with this code

if(i == 15000){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 14050;//item look class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 14051; class8.anInt200 = 14051; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Bandos Scimitar"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Scimitar dropped by the ultimate barrows.".getBytes(); }
